channel.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
channel.description:
Hey I am just wanting some suggestions, I want to base a server more on maplestory ps, such as having ::rebirth when all skills (combat skills) reach 100 you can set them back to 1 and lets say gain +20 str bonus or somthing, any suggestions on how to do this or what the reward (i.e +20 str bonus) should be?
Thanks

item.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

anyone have any idea how I could make somthing like setSkillXP(1, 0); ?

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

If you got to level 100, more experience would make it go up more levels. Negative Experience = Less Experience… So, less experience = less levels? 83 exp - 1 exp = Level 2 to 1. … Common sense?

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
item.dc:creator: @ginger_ninja ginger_ninja
item.description:
@ginger_ninja wrote:

yeah, I’d setEXP not add negative exp, therefore it sets to 1.
I’ll keep trying.

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Copy a master command, and make it give negative experience. Just enough so it gets back to 1. (15-16m would be plenty…)

Of course, people do train afterwards… And they could always keep doing it :
It’s either impossible, or really really REALLY complicated.

Read full topic

item.title: Rebirth? Maplestory based?
item.dc:creator: @NONAMESCAPE NONAMESCAPE
item.description:
@NONAMESCAPE wrote:

lol you should make it prestiege not rebirth…nah idk…good idea tho…you could try edit a ::master command?..idk the bonus thing
